mapper.select: SELECT post_id, view_count, trend_score, last_viewed_at FROM trending WHERE last_viewed_at >= #{since} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY trend_score DESC, last_viewed_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT post_id, view_count, trend_score, last_viewed_at FROM trending WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY trend_score DESC, last_viewed_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT post_id, view_count, trend_score, last_viewed_at FROM trending WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
